patthana15.59:1.1_0: Sappītikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:1.1_1: Appītikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:1.1_2: Sappītikaṁ kusalañca appītikaṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:2.1_0: Sappītikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:2.1_1: Appītikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.59:2.1_2: Sappītikaṁ akusalañca appītikaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
